biotools.summary:
This tool separates junction reads based on their linear or circular origin. Only non-ambiguous junction reads are used to compare the relative linear and circular transcript abundance.
Together with the circ fraction (circ/(circ+lin)), a 95% confidence interval is provided.

bioschemas.name: CiLiQuant
